venue.name: Peter's Park - Joe Wex Dog Run

item.description:
Hi everyone,

Many of you met the awesome Batman at a May or June meetups. Well, Batman and his human are moving back to Chicago at the end of June.

So we're having one more frenchie meetup this month to say Bon Voyage! We'll even have delicious grain-free doggie cupcakes to celebrate!

Please join us this Saturday the 26th to play with our buddy Batman one more time before he heads back to Chicago to fight crime.

We can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde
item.how_to_find_us: Join us in the small enclosure.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: June 26th French Bulldog Meetup - Bon Voyage Batman!
